tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE livestock_health (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    activity_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE animal (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    species VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    sex VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    accuracy FLOAT,
    battery_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  value FLOAT
);
